sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary mx-2" 
  @click="editDetail(subId)">
    แก้ไขข้อมูล
  </button>
  <button class="btn btn-sm btn-danger mx-2" @click="delDetail(subId)">
    ลบข้อมูล
  </button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "SubjDel",
  props: ["subId"],
  data() {
    return {};
  },
  methods: {
    editDetail(theID) {
      this.$emit("edit", theID);
    },
    delDetail(theID) {
      fetch('http://localhost:3000/course/' + theID, {
        method: "DELETE"
      })
        .then(response => {
          if (!response.ok) {
            throw new Error('Network response was not ok');
          }
          this.$emit('delete');
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.error('There was a problem with your fetch operation:', error);
        }),
  },
};
</script>

<style>
</style>
